title: Understanding Schedule I Substances
text: Schedule I substances are considered the most dangerous class of drugs with a high potential for abuse and no accepted medical use.

title: Characteristics of Schedule I Substances
text: These substances are not considered safe for use even under medical supervision.

hintAnswer: no currently accepted medical use and a high potential for abuse
title: Identifying Schedule I Substances
text: Which of the following characteristics best describes Schedule I substances?
choices: spray paints, markers, glue, gasoline, and cleaning fluids
no currently accepted medical use and a high potential for abuse
no potential for abuse, with use potentially leading to severe psychological or physical dependence
